<math>\begin{array}{c}\underline{\text{9. Formats}}\\ 
\\ 
{}^{b}x,\stackrel{b}{x},{x}^{b},\begin{array}{c}x+y=0\\ 
x-y=1\end{array}\\ 
{}_{b}x,\underset{b}{x},{x}_{b},\begin{array}{c}x+y=0\\ 
x-y=1\\ 
x-z=2\end{array}\\ 
\text{aligned left}\\ 
\text{also aligned left}\\ 
\mathrm{centered}\\ 
r\\ 
\mathrm{also}\mathrm{aligned}r\\ 
\begin{array}{cc}a& 	x\\ 
b& 	y\end{array}\\ 
a\mathrm{small}\mathrm{gap}\\ 
a\mathrm{gap}\end{array}</math>
